frameDefinitions: An Employee has a Position doing work in a particular Field, or doing work on a particular Task, for which an Employer gives Compensation to the Employee.
A Speaker uses a particular linguistic form, a Name to refer to an Entity.
This frame concerns entities conventionally being referred to by particular names.
A Cognizer calls up an episodic memory of past Experience or an Impression of a Salient_entity formed  on the basis of past experience.
This is an abstract frame for acts performed by sentient beings.
An Agent acts in a certain Manner either generally or under some particular Circumstances.
frameExamples: Undocumented foreigners are <t>working</t> as  building contractors for Laing Builders.
They corresponded frequently and at length, exchanging intimate letters in which he <t>addressed</t> her as Windflower.
Kozmo could <t>remember</t> when his modem was the fastest he could buy.
He pledges to  <t>conduct</t> himself  with honesty and humility.
listRoleDefinitions: The <fen>Employee</fen> is obligated to perform a <fen>Task</fen> in order to receive <fen>Compensation</fen>.
The <fen>Employer</fen> gives <fen>Compensation</fen> to an <fen>Employee</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Place_of_employment</fen> of the <fen>Employee</fen>.
The label given to a particular type of employment.
The <fen>Employee</fen> is obligated to perform the <fen>Task</fen> to recieve <fen>Compensation</fen> from the <fen>Employer</fen> .
This role identifies the <fen>Field</fen> in which one works.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> period during which an <fen>Employee</fen>  works for an <fen>Employer</fen>.
The location where the <fen>Employee</fen> works.
The person who uses the <fen>Name</fen>  to refer to the <fen>Entity</fen>.
The entity that is designated by the <fen>Speaker</fen> with the <fen>Name</fen> used.
The linguistic form used by the <fen>Speaker</fen> to refer to the <fen>Entity</fen>.
The point of time or interval when the <fen>Speaker</fen> uses the <fen>Name</fen>.
<fen>Name</fen> identifies the linguistic expression used to refer to Entities.
The <fen>Entity</fen> is the person the speaker intends to refer to by using a particular name.
A person who recalls memories of past experience or impressions.
A person or thing that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> remembers as being involved in some state or event or as having some property.
A past event or state that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> witnessed and is now recalling. The <fen>Experience</fen> may be a specific event or state or a vaguer period that is treated as a unit.

A property that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> attributes to the <fen>Salient_entity</fen> based on their past experience of the <fen>Salient_entity</fen> or a category to which the <fen>Salient_entity</fen> is assigned.
A property or role that a <fen>Salient_entity</fen> actually held and which frames the memories that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> has of the <fen>Salient_entity</fen>.
The time when the <fen>Cognizer</fen> remembers the experience.
This role identifies the <fen>Act</fen> that the <fen>Agent</fen> performs intentionally.
The <fen>Agent</fen> performs the intentional act.
This role identifies the time when the Agent acts intentionally.
This role identifies the place where the intentional act occurs.
This role marks expressions that denote the person whose conduct is being evaluated.
This role marks expressions that characterize the way that the <fen>Agent</fen> behaves.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Agent</fen> behaves in a certain way.
The location at which the <fen>Agent</fen> exhibits their behavior.
listRoleExamples: <fex>My Mom</fex> works for the Michigan Department of Agriculture.
My mom works <fex>for an Eye Doctor</fex>.
The undocumented foreigners were working <fex>at the organic farm</fex>.
Louise works <fex>as an engineer</fex>.
My dad works <fex>building houses.</fex>
Undocumented foreigners work <fex>in construction</fex> for years.

<fex>From 2000-2001</fex>, Mr. Eckhardt clerked for The Honorable Jerry A. Funk,
United States Bankruptcy Judge, Middle District of Florida.
Most people work <fex>in the city</fex>.
<fex>The Lord, who was charmed by her beauty,</fex> addressed her as 'than kaadhali!' (My darling) and hence the name.
And that's the reason why we called <fex>him</fex> 'Tom' when his real name was actually John.
A male voice answered the call, and Jones addressed the man as <fex>'Johnny.'</fex>
No one had <fex>ever</fex> called her 'my lady'.
My name is <fex>Bond</fex>.
<fex>You</fex> have an unusual surname.
I will truly miss Delmar and <fex>I</fex> will always remember when his eyes lit up everytime he got ice-cream.
today I saw a sister's exclassmate, and didn't recognise him, I remember <fex>him</fex> taller.
I can still remember <fex>saying the pledge every morning before class in elementary school</fex>, a rare occurrence among elementary school kids nowadays.
I remember Peter <fex>as immensely kind in those first three weeks before I was packed off to boarding school</fex>.
Atulprasad is principally remembered <fex>as a musician and composer</fex>.
I 'll <fex>never</fex> forget being in hospital
<fex>We</fex> have not yet acted .
<fex>Douglas Hurd</fex> carried himself well
They stood together and posed for the pass, Alleyne relaxed and smiling , a tall , angular man who carried himself <fex>with natural elegance</fex> .
She knew that she had behaved badly <fex>last night</fex>

Sometimes an offender may be placed at a Probation hostel because they have committed
a serious offence or have behaved badly <fex>at an independent hostel</fex>
